reviews.review: หนุกสัสหยุดไม่ได้

2018年5月13号的新评测：不知为何，今天连续几次【无网络连接：黎明杀机服务器当前不可用。请稍后重试。】没开加速器之前，以及开了网易UU加速器后，都有这情况。略怕丢档，虽然我没遇到过这情况。（づ￣3￣）づ╭❤～(๑′ᴗ‵๑)Ｉ Lᵒᵛᵉᵧₒᵤ❤ლ(′◉❥◉｀ლ)坐等6月15号2周年出来什么大搞作。
2017年7月7日的旧评测：我见过一些无耻的人皇，最后一个队友去修发电机了，被抓又逃脱，明明有1-2分钟机会修最后一个发电机开闸，他偏偏不去修发电机，也不营救队友，就自己一个人躲着，等地窖出来就跑，无耻至极。有一些队友也不会转脑袋，遇到一些死命守尸的杀手，就舍弃队友赶快修发电机啊。特别是一直在跟杀手为了被挂在挂钩上的队友绕了几分钟，看准杀手是要杀死一个人的，就利用好时间啊。正契弟！
杨永信这个杀手一般，开局电人，后面一定要用狼牙棒挥低一个人，单单电视电不晕的，觉得用一次狼牙棒回复时间消耗太久。
玩了8.5个小时，所有人类、杀手都是2级了，有几个升到3级。
别开局就把逃生门那里的发电机修好。
เล่นแล้วสนุกครับ
好玩

I really like this game. Great tension. Beautifully created. The only hitch is that nobody, including me, wants to play as the killer. I might get two good rounds in as a survivor and then I end up waiting for a lobby. And waiting... and waiting. If I'm going to burn time, I'd rather burn it PLAYING something rather than waiting for something.

Pros: The suspense and strategy of the game is fun especially when you play with friends. The game can be played hours on end, even on a cheapish laptop.

Edit: My review previously said that a con was that the multiplayer system barely worked but it has since been fixed in the latest update.

TL;DR The game is fucking fun and awesome... when you can successfully get into a fair game, key phrases being 'successfully get into' and 'fair game'.

[h1]Full Review[/h1] 
-------------------------------------------------
Dead by Daylight is a fantastic idea. 4 unwitting victims, from many different walks of life each with their own unique abilities and skills trying to survive as 1 killer, who can be many different monsters from Michael Myers to a Swamp-Witch, tries to hunt you down. You frantically try to start the generators to power the exit to escape the killers, without being killed.

Did I mention that at full build the game is actually well balanced?

I'm not going to delve into all the mechanics of the game, just see some gameplay footage for that, but it's fun and feels like it could be anybody's game.

You're probably wondering why I'm not recommending the game. The problem is: those sorts of games are about 1 in 10. 

Let's start with the first big problem, Multiplayer/Netcode: The Multiplayer feels like an Origin game in closed alpha. Our match ratio of lobbies formed to games played was [i] nearly 6:1[/i] because we averaged about 4-5 lobby crashes before we got a game, and about 1 in 3 games either the killer DCed before the game started (I assume this was a server error rather than actually DC), had a lagfest of a game to the point of teleportation (all 4 in our party, not on the same internet), or once the game disconnected 2 of us and the killer and other player still alive stayed in. No idea what kind of error that is. The current system depipped* me twice over killer DCs and also allows for teleport hacks by way of terrible internet. Even if the host is causing upward of 1000ms ping, you can't disconnect without depipping* Also, the game crashes too: I witnessed it many, MANY times last night. Furthermore, the lost connection error in lobby screen also should not close the whole game, rather exit to title. Let me repeat: if you get a certain sever error, you have to exit the game and restart it. [b]The multiplayer feels like an early access game or even a closed alpha.[/b] 
The multiplayer is worse than Titanfall 2, a game that was lauded by critics and almost everyone who played it but ultimately failed due to atrocius multiplayer and release window timing.

Onto the second big problem, Matchmaking: The current system allows for anyone waiting for more than 2 minutes to completely circumvent matchmaking, [b]and there is only ranked mode, starting from your first game.[/b] In a game that's been released for a year, there is no quickplay; and in ranked mode you can easily be placed against people much, much better. Let me [url=http://imgur.com/a/uHU4e]show you[/url] a game I played last night, one of my first 10 games ever. For context, rank 20 is the worst possible rank, and 1 is the very best. I am a rank 20. It's like Bronze vs. Challenger/Grandmaster, to compare to more popular multiplayer titles. This also leads us to a side note: the grind. In dead by daylight, each character has their own unique "bloodweb". To sum it up, you deposit in-game currency and it spits out an assortment of random one-use items, 'offerings', which are one use items that affect the whole game rather than your character, and "perks", basically your extra skills. Unfortunately for you, each character has a unique bloodweb and each one is ridiculously expensive to even unlock all 4 perks, the fact that you can't even equip 4 perks until ridiculously high-level nonwithstanding. Did I mention perks come in three tiers that are increasingly rare, and therefore require even more grind? Basically, the grind is league of legends-tier in a game you pay for. That's completely unacceptable, let alone  players with all level 3 perks and super rare items against players with one level 1 perk in a ranked game, let alone the skill gap of the highest possible rank vs. a team average of rank 17.

These problems lead to even more problems, like pushing away new players from a dying game (a game where you get stomped over and and over again for hundreds of games, if you even manage to load in will cause a lot of refunds and 2.1 hour playtime accounts). 

Oh yeah, the graphics are mediocre at best, even on ultra settings.

I could go on but for the sake of keeping this review sub novel-length, I'll just conclude with this:

This game is an alpha that the devs are treating as if it was finished. Don't buy it.


THE GOOD: Concept, Balance**
THE BAD: Grind, Graphics
THE FUGLY: Netcode, Matchmaking

EDIT: coming to you live from a new error, the infinite loading screen!

*A pip is a ranked point. You need 3 to rank up. Depipping is the confiscation of a pip.
**at full build

EDIT 2: Hey guys, it's been a wild ride since I bought the game and wrote this review. TL;DR: they have dratically changed the game balance through a series of new, stronger killers and a rework of an old killer making him significantly stronger; along with other changes. Furthermore, the devs don't think griefing (defined as ruining the game for another player, even if it disadvantages you) is a problem.

I would not recommend this game more strongly now.

Editing downvote to upvote as of 03.2020: They have finally fixed most of the issues that I have mentioned earlier, it took years tho it is still negative for me but the current state of the game is much better and decent.

Even a dumb company like Ubisoft changed "peer to peer" connections to dedicated servers for "for honor" & "the division" even after 2 years of their launch. You have been around with dbd almost 3 years, so which makes you even dumber.
Most of my games start with 2-3 people, all of the rare offerings, add-ons getting wasted. Rage quitting is pretty welcome too. You have around 20k active players and the game is on free to try most of the time. Isn't this a bad sign for you yet? Until you fix those issues, you are gonna be missing my $Benjamin Franklin's$. 

Tip 1: Start focusing on the main issues instead of bundles.
Tip 2: Remove the reporting system. We all know with 20k active players you wouldn't dare to ban anybody with hate speech issues. If you do, lobby time would increase.

I think the killer "Hag" is supposed to be weakened because of its trap.I mean , you can touch off a clip trap only with hand and can easily see it when focused. But we almost cant discover or distroy a trap of Hag without a torch.Obviously its impossible for player to bring torch in each game just because of a low possibility that they meet a Hag. This results in the invincibility of an invisible trap.And Hag can even move to its trap when necessary,which makes saving and repairing more difficult . Both of hag and nurse can move in distance but nurse still need to find survivor herself but hag's trap will tell it the location of survivors and move suddenly.Although the the distance of trap is limited , hag can still know the location and go there, thats too easy for killlerplayers.Its tooooo unfair for other killer or players.
Compared to other killers ,i think ,hag is much more powerful and agressive . when most players find the ability of hag so strong and the ability can bring them victory easily , the balance of dead by daylight will be broken soon.
I write so much because i like this game and want it to be better. When i play a survivor who was killed by killer ,i will say the killer plays well. But when the killer is hag , I only feel that the game was destroyed totally. Maybe the player is good too, but the killer itself is so disguisting.
I love this game and it is fun however the lack of text chat in a multiplayer game like this is insane. I will change my review when they add in-game chat.

As far as a competitive asymmetric game goes this by far is one of the best games I've played in that regard. It uses enough mechanics to allow a deadly game of cat and mouse between a killer and 4 victims: who have no means to fight back directly other then distract, juke, blind or stun the killer.

The killer starts the game with the hardest or easiest task, chasing down each survivor which gets easier up until the last person alive provided some generators have been completed. The killer uses their abilities to hunt the survivors down and knock them to the ground so they can be picked up and offered as a sacrfice to the entity on a hook. 

What often is hard for the survivors is to remain hidden and elude the killer which becomes harder to do as the match progresses on. Each generator completed makes one less generator to work on and activate to escape, which involves less patrolling for the killer themselves to maintain. The game goes into a deeper gameplay when one of the survivors is caught because then it becomes a struggle of rescuing the person or leaving them to die which gives you one less person to depend on for your escape.

I've owned this game for some time now. It's a lot of fun. The devs have done a lot of work to try and balance the game between the killer and the survivors, not making it too easy or too hard for either side. Sometimes they fall short, but the community quickly lets them know when something needs to be changed, and 9/10 times, they listen. I can't say that this game gives me scares like it used to, but almost every game is exhilerating and exciting. Rating: 8.5/10

시작은 어떤 한 인터넷방송인의 플레이영상이었다.
매우 신박한 설정의 1vs4 공포생존협력게임.(생존자입장)
어그로와 인성질, 그리고 살인마를 놀리는 재미.
내가 이게임을 사기에는 너무나도 충분한 이유였다.
그러나 대부분의 사람들이 그렇듯이 나또한 처음에는 우와우와거리다가 갈고리에 꿰어져 하늘로 승천하는 꼴을 많이보았다.
뛰어다니면 살인마 입장에서 뒤에 빨간색스크래치가 남는다는사실을 몰랐기 때문에.
그리고 빈약한 퍽, 그시절 한창 유행하던 첫희생자 무시메타 등이 겹쳐결국난 벽을 등지며 살아가는 겁쟁이가 됐다.
하지만 점점 익숙해지는 살인마와의 면담, 
심장박동이 빨라지면 공포가 아니라 살인마와 같이 뛰어다닐 생각에 희열을 느끼게 된 나는 어느새 어엿한 1랭 생존자였다.
